title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" popup action is enabled even when a manual build is not needed and the build is already done.
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled in all scenarios.
EB: The "Build" popup action should only be enabled when a manual build is needed and the build is not already done.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Trigger a build.
3. Verify that the "Build" popup action is enabled.
4. Ensure that the build is completed successfully.
5. Trigger another build.
6. Verify that the "Build" popup action is disabled since the build is already done.
